quiz.question: Which leader led the Champaran Satyagraha in 1917, Gandhi's first active struggle in India?
Which Indian ruler established the Mughal dynasty's greatest territorial expansion under his reign?
Which 1907 split in the Congress divided it into Moderates and Extremists at which city session?
Who led the Salt March to Dandi in 1930 as part of the civil disobedience movement?
Which movement beginning in 1905 protested the partition of Bengal and promoted indigenous industry?
Which leader authored the pamphlet 'Why I am an Atheist' and influenced revolutionary youth in early 20th century India?
Which leader famously declared 'Do or Die' during the Quit India Movement?
Which congress leader led the Bardoli Satyagraha in 1928 and later became Prime Minister of Bombay Presidency?
Which peasant leader led the Bardoli Satyagraha's local committee demanding tax rollback in 1928?
Which city was the center of the Revolt of 1857 where the rebellion began in May?
Which Mughal emperor faced the Maratha resurgence led by Shivaji in the 17th century?
Which treaty ended the Third Anglo-Maratha War and marked the effective end of Maratha sovereignty in 1818?
Which Mughal emperor commissioned the Taj Mahal in memory of his wife Mumtaz Mahal?
Which treaty in 1765 granted the East India Company the Diwani rights of Bengal, Bihar and Orissa?
Which British official introduced the Permanent Settlement in 1793 altering land revenue relations in Bengal?
